duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise construction teams and ensure the installation, repair, and maintenance of network infrastructure.
Plan logistics, schedule mobilization to work locations, and drive safety culture implementation.
Coordinate deliveries, purchase of materials, and conduct onsite training.
Support the execution of innovative technologies and ensure compliance with standards.
Maintain construction materials inventory, monitor KPIs, and create career paths for team members.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required. Valid driver's license required, DOT/CDL preferred. OSHA 10 required, OSHA 30 or greater preferred.
